4.4.2 Trace

breakpoint

Function

Structure

Shell.Trace

Type

val breakpoint: string -> unit

Syntax

breakpoint name -> ()

Arguments

name
A string.

Values

()

Description

Sets a breakpoint on a function called name. Breakpoints are also set on all functions with identifiers starting with name.
